article: a ninth body was found friday morning at the charred site of a christmas eve massacre where a recently divorced man dressed as santa shot indiscriminately at partygoers and destroyed his former in-laws ' house with a homemade device that sprayed flammable liquid .
abstract: man in santa suit kills # self on christmas eve
